text: Randers Cimbria is a Danish basketball team based in Randers.Eurobasket.com Randers Page The best season of the team in history were 2014 and 2020, when they finished second in the Basketligaen. ==Honours== Basketligaen *Runners-up (2): 2013–14, 2019–20 ==Players== ===Current roster=== ===Individual awards=== Basketligaen MVP * Bonell Colas – 2009 ==Season by season== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" !Season !Tier !League ! !Danish Cup !colspan=2|European competitions |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2014–15 | align="center"|1 | Basketligaen | align="center" | 6th | Semifinalist | colspan=2 | |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2015–16 | align="center"|1 | Basketligaen | align="center" | 6th | Semifinalist | colspan=2 | |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2016–17 | align="center"|1 | Basketligaen | align="center" | 7th | Quarterfinalist | colspan=2 | |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2017–18 | align="center"|1 | Basketligaen | align="center" bgcolor=#e1b384 | 3rd | Quarterfinalist | colspan=2 | |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2018–19 | align="center"|1 | Basketligaen | align="center"|4th | Quarterfinalist | colspan=2 | |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2019–20 | align="center"|1 | Basketligaen | align="center" bgcolor=silver|2nd | | colspan=2 | |- |} ==References== Category:Basketball teams in Denmark Category:1965 establishments in Denmark Category:Basketball teams established in 1965
